alert.note: Alert for Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 02 at 5:47AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN IBERIA...NORTHERN ST. MARY AND SOUTHEASTERN ST. MARTIN PARISHES THROUGH 630 AM CST... At 546 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Sorrel to near Baldwin to near Cote Blanche Island. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morgan City, Franklin, Patterson, Jeanerette, Berwick, Bayou Vista, Stephensville, Baldwin, Patterson Memorial Airport, Glencoe, Sorrel, Amelia, Bayou Geneve, Charenton, and Centerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary
